title: Ticket #1359: Viewing what kind of jobs aren't matching
description:
At condor week, in the virtual machine talk we discussed the concept of rolling VM's out that would match the requested types of jobs that have no matches.

People thought about doing this by hacking condor rooster, but this made me wonder if it might be possible to have the negotiator ad contain information on the number of non-matches, and the type of machine ads would are needed.

Kind of like an inverted condor_q.. here's the machines that we aren't matching with.
creator: khahn
